Author: red_ossifrage
Text: That sounds really upsetting for you. It's also perhaps a sign that you're not enjoying a healthy relationship with porn right now, if it's disrupting your actual intimacy. Maybe it's time to consider taking a break? Or moving to amateur content with real-world bodies?   I don't know if this makes you feel better, but a lot of people in professional porn (or fake "amateur" porn) are skinny because of drugs, both prescribed and illegal. :/ It's not a sustainable or ideal body type AT ALL, not for the roided-out men and especially not for the waif-thin, regularly lipoed women.
